doc:
John Brascia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Brascia 0 John F. Brascia (May 11, 1932 – February 19, 2013) was an American actor and dancer, best known for his dancing partnerships on film with Vera-Ellen in White Christmas (1954) and with Cyd Charisse and Liliane Montevecchi in Meet Me in Las Vegas (1956). John_F._Brascia ( May_11_,_1932 – February_19_,_2013 ) was an_American_actor_and_dancer , best_known for his_dancing_partnerships on film with Vera-Ellen in White_Christmas ( 1954 ) and with Cyd_Charisse and Liliane_Montevecchi in Meet_Me in Las_Vegas ( 1956 ) .
